title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 303.8 - Decision and award of arbitrator
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 303.8 - Decision and award of arbitrator

State Regulations
(a) The arbitrator shall provide written
notification of any award or decision to the interested parties, with copy to
the Workers' Compensation Board. (b) The decision and award of the arbitrator
shall be deemed to constitute a final decision of the Workers' Compensation

Board except if review of such decision is sought as provided in section
303.9
of this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
303.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
